quest.name: City of Final Pleasures
journal: Alphinaud weighs the brush you received from Tristol, deep in thought.

With Tristol's brush in hand, Alphinaud lays out his plan to gain entry to Eulmore: he will pose as a painter, and you will play the role of his faithful assistant. Thus resolved, you depart for Gatetown, hoping that the manic jesters will soon return in search of a replacement artist...

After a short wait, your patience is rewarded. As predicted, the jongleurs emerge to recruit a new artist, and Alphinaud's act proves sufficiently convincing to earn you both an invitation into Eulmore.

As nonchalantly as you can, you pass through the gates, and take in the sights and sounds of the city. The red-garbed jester stands near the entrance, waiting to provide you with further instructions.
You listen carefully as your smirking guide explains the process by which Eulmoran citizenship is obtained. It seems your first step is to present yourself to the clerk at the Bureau of Immigration.

After describing the basics of Eulmoran society and your place within it, the immigration officer hands you a set of registration papers. You are to deliver them to the neighboring Bureau of Registration, where your status as citizens will be officially approved.

The registration officer soon approves your papers, but takes offense at your bodily odor. You are duly supplied with a bottle of perfume, and ushered next door to the Delousery, where you are expected to make thorough use of the bathing facilities.
You emerge from the shower, clean and refreshed. According to the clerk's instructions, you are now required to apply liberal quantities of the sweet-smelling perfume previously provided...
You dutifully splash yourself with the liquid, and the delicate scent of roses fills your nostrils. Lovely. As for Alphinaud, it appears he has yet to enter the Delousery...

After some encouragement, Alphinaud overcomes his bashfulness and plunges into the showers for a quick wash, emerging a short while later in a cloud of perfume. Now that you both smell as if you've wrestled in a flower bed instead of a drainage ditch, you are free to trouble Cornenne for directions to the Chai residence.
Cornenne gives you an overview of the city's layout and tells you where to find your new patrons. It seems your path leads up the steps to the Canopy, and thence into the Grand Dame's Parlor.

Despite some initial suspicion on Chai-Nuzz's part, you─and especially Alphinaud─appear to have made a favorable impression on the effusive Dulia-Chai, cementing your place in the city. At last, Eulmore's mysteries are yours to explore...
objectives: Present your registration papers to the registration officer.
Scrub yourself clean in the Delousery showers.

dialogue.name: TRISTOL
dialogue.text: Should you make it into the city, have care what you say and do. I wouldn't want you to save my life only to lose your own...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: They say kindness is its own reward, but Tristol has repaid us with a gift as timely as it was unexpected.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will, however, need to act upon his advice before another painter steps in to fill the vacancy. Thankfully, I do have some modest skill with a brush. Nothing approaching that of a true artist, of course, but enough to play the role, I would hope.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: As for you... Hmmm... Well...if you don't mind taking a subordinate role, mayhap you could pose as my assistant?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Then it is settled! All we need do now is return to Gatetown, and await the next appearance of those vile jesters.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Now we wait. This should be as good a place as any.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Here they come...

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: Ladies and gentlemen! Your attention once more! What a day it's been for the folks at our door!

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: We've welcomed a peddler who made pearls from a plum, and now we've a place for a painter of aplomb.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: So come along and don't be slow! It's time to let your colors show!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I can paint. Portraits, at least. Landscapes and still lifes are so rarely commissioned these days...

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: Oho, I thought I spied some new faces in the crowd. What fortune that you should feel at ease around an easel!

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: What proof have you of your prowess? Any masterpieces on your person?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Sadly not. Everything I paint is soon sold. Such is the life of a working artist.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have only my brush to testify for me─though you will note that it has seen no small amount of service.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: Aha, hoho, hm hm. Flecks of paint, both old and new, a tool much loved and much used.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: Not a prop to be conjured on the hop! Very well! Come with us, and we'll put those talents to the test!

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: And who is this hanger-on? Well-wisher or parasite?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Why, this is my assistant. SheHe whose unfailing support allows my art to flourish. I will go with herhim or not at all!

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: Parasite, then. We shall leave herhis fate in the hands of your new employer─it matters not a whit to us.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: And having filled our latest vacant space, we retire to Eulmore's sweet embrace!

dialogue.name: GATETOWNPEOPLE03286
dialogue.text: (-Gatetown Residents-)...

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: Oh, mercy me! The meol! We almost took our leave without leaving a loving token!

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: We must empty the sacks ere we make our way back!

dialogue.name: Q0
dialogue.text: Continue with the main scenario quest?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Eulmore. Finally...

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFBLUE
dialogue.text: Looks even grander from this angle, eh? Eh?

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: Welcome, welcome, to the city of final pleasures! Feel free to weep at its magnificence! ...No? Not even a single tear? Moving right along, then!

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: Our first task is to register you as residents─you know, make it all nice and official. We'll smooth the way, so you just need to put on your happy faces and head through to Joyous Hall.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: The Bureau of Immigration is in the first room on the left side of the passage. Declare your name and occupation in a nice loud voice─the clerks will tell you where to go from there.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: Oh, and pay no mind to those folk off to the side of the road. Much like the hopefuls in Gatetown, they haven't earned the right to enter the city proper.

dialogue.name: CLOWNOFRED
dialogue.text: If, however, you enjoy basking in the envy of your fellow man, then by all means...take your time. But why waste another moment? Go! Enjoy the beginning of your new life in paradise!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Bureau of Immigration, was it? I suppose we had better show ourselves willing for the time being...

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Welcome to Eulmore, fortunate friends! May I have your names?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I am Alphinaud, an artist, and this is Forename, my assistant.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, I was informed of your imminent arrival. We can forgo the usual interview and begin processing your registration papers forthwith.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Now, the citizens of Eulmore are divided into two classes. There are the “free,” who are blessed with the favor of Lord Vauthry, and the “bonded,” who work in the employ of the free.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: You will be joining the ranks of the bonded. Your duties are to serve a patron in the capacity for which you were chosen─in your case, painting pretty pictures.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Should your patron dismiss you for any reason, you must find another sponsor among the free, or accept work as a general laborer.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I see. And might you tell us something of the patron we are to serve?

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: The two patrons, actually. Chai-Nuzz and Dulia-Chai─a Mystel couple whom most refer to as the “Chais.”

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: They are both gentle souls, but I would ask that you conduct yourself with respect and humility...for your own sake as much as theirs.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Now. A moment, please, while I complete the relevant paperwork...

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: All in order. These are your registration documents.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Take those papers next door and submit them to the clerk. Once they've been stamped, you will officially be Eulmoran citizens.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Enjoy your new life in paradise!

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFIMMIGRATION
dialogue.text: Have you submitted your papers to the Bureau of Registration? Everything in its proper place!

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Bureau of Registration. Papers, please.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text:
What have we here...?
“Alphinaud, artist. Forename, artist's assistant. To be employed in the service of Lord Chai-Nuzz and Lady Dulia-Chai...”

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: Yes, everything seems to be in order! Your registration is hereby approved.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: I think it best that we deliver you to the Chai residence before─

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: <sniff> Hm? <sniff> <sniff> Oh dear...

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: You smell...hideous!

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: Did you crawl here through a ditch? It's like an unholy miasma of dust and sweat and the musk of some unwashed beast!

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: Proceed directly to the Delousery next door and scrub yourselves clean. Use whichever showers are free.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: After you've rinsed away that stench, you'll want to splash yourselves with this perfume. Liberally.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: Once you've made yourself presentable, then you may proceed to the Chai residence. Cornenne, the guard by the stairs, will give you directions.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I hadn't realized we were so...aromatic.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We're to bathe in here, then...?

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: A clean Eulmoran is a happy Eulmoran! Don't forget to scrub behind your ears!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You rinse yourself clean in the stream of water...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You apply the perfume as directed, and the delicate scent of roses fills the air...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Oh, you've showered and dressed already, have you...?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Is it not─ Th-That is to say... Ahem. It seems rather...exposed for one's ablutions, does it not...?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Hurry up and shower, stinky.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: What would Estinien say...?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Alisaie would have been drying her hair by now.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Fine. Just a quick rinse, then...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Good gods... You will mention nothing of this! Swear to me!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Wouldn't she just. Very well...I shall endeavor to emulate her boldness, then. Courage, Alphinaud!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, that was bracing! I believe the lingering smells of the road have been successfully expunged.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Shall we go and present ourselves to our new patrons, then?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We'll need directions to the Chai residence.

dialogue.name: BUREAUOFREGISTRATION
dialogue.text: Ah, what a heavenly fragrance!

dialogue.name: CORNENN
dialogue.text: You're looking to present yourselves to the Chais, are you? Let me explain how the city's laid out, then. Imagine three layers, one on top of the other...

dialogue.name: CORNENN
dialogue.text: This layer here is called the Buttress. Above us is the Understory, where the military has its headquarters. And above that, you've got the Canopy, which is where the free citizens of Eulmore spend their days.

dialogue.name: CORNENN
dialogue.text: So if you want to find your new patrons, you'll need to keep climbing until you run out of stairs, then look for the “Grand Dame's Parlor.” They'll be in there, like as not.

dialogue.name: CORNENN
dialogue.text: Up the stairs to the Canopy, I said! The Chais should be in the Grand Dame's Parlor.
